Dovinis Bebas Sofyan Basir Mengucap Syukur
04 Nov 2019, 13:43 by Eko Sulestyono



Dovinis Bebas Sofyan Basir Mengucap Syukur



Dovinis Bebas Sofyan Basir Mengucap Syukur


KBRN, Jakarta : Ketua Majelis Hakim Pengadilan Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor) Jakarta, Hariono yang memimpin jalannya persidangan terdakwa Sofyan Basir memutuskan telah memvonis bebas yang bersangkutan dari segala dakwaan Jaksa Penuntut Umum (JPU)  Komisi Pembeantasan Korupsi (KPK).
"Mengadili menyatakan bahwa terdakwa Sofyan Basir dinyatakan tidak terbukti secara sah dan meyakinkan sebagaimana dakwaan pertama dan kedua," kata Ketua Majelis Hakim Hariono saat membacakan amar putusan dalam sidang di Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat, Senin (4/11/2019).
Sementara itu terdakwa Sofyan awalnya tampak terlihat hanya terdiam di kursi terdakwa sambil mendengarkan pembacaan vonis putusan bebas. Sofyan kemudian berdoa dan mengucapkan syukur di hadapan majelis hakim, jaksa, penasehat atau kuasa hukum hingga pengunjung yang datang memadati ruangan persidangan.
“Nggak ada persiapan apa-apa, kita hanya mendengarkan saja apa putusan majelis hakim” kata Sofyan Basir di Gedung Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
Sementara itu, tak lama setelah  persidangan ditutup, Sofyan tampak langsung menghampiri dan memeluk tim pengacaranya. Sofyan tak lupus juga menghampiri dan memeluk kerabat atau keluarganya yang datang untuk memberikan dukungan moral kepadanya.
Majelis hakim memutuskan bahwa Sofyan dinyatakan tidak terlibat dalam kasus dugaan suap berkaitan dengan proses kesepakatan proyek pembangunan Pembangkit Listrik Tenaga Uang (PLTU).
Proyek yang dimaksud adalah pembangunan Independent Power Producer Pembangkit Listrik Tenaga Uap Mulut Tambang (IPP PLTU MT) Riau-1 antara PT Pembangkitan Jawa Bali Investasi (PJBI) dan Blackgold Natural Resources (BNR) Ltd dan China Huadian Engineering Company Limited (CHEC) Ltd.
Majelis hakim juga menyatakan bahwa Sofyan tidak terbukti ikut berperan membantu mantan Anggota Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat (DPR) Eni Maulani Saragih dalam menerima suap.m
Sebelumnya JPU KPK mendakwa bahwa Sofyan Basir mengetahui terkait adanya dugaan pemberian suap dari pengusaha Johannes Budisutrisno Kotjo kepada Eni.
Sofyan sebelumnya dituntut jaksa dengan acaman hukuman 5 tahun penjara dan denda Rp 200 juta subsider 3 bulan kurungan.
JPU KPK meyakini Sofyan bersalah karena diduga memfasilitasi pemberian suap dari pengusaha Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo kepada mantan anggota DPR Eni Maulani Saragih dan mantan Mensos Idrus Marham.

Dovinis Free Sofyan Basir Give Thanks
04 Nov 2019, 13:43 by Eko Sulestyono



Dovinis Free Sofyan Basir Give Thanks



Dovinis Free Sofyan Basir Give Thanks


KBRN, Jakarta: Chairperson of the Jakarta Corruption Court (Tipikor) Judge Hariono, who presided over the trial of the defendant Sofyan Basir, decided to have acquitted the relevant person from all charges of the Public Prosecutor (JPU) Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK).
"Prosecuting stated that the defendant Sofyan Basir was declared not proven legally and convincingly as the first and second indictments," Chairman of the Panel of Judges Hariono read the verdict in the trial at the Jakarta Corruption Court, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Kemayoran, Central Jakarta, Monday (4 / 11/2019).
Meanwhile the defendant Sofyan initially seemed to be seen only silent in the defendant's chair while listening to the reading of the verdict of the acquittal. Sofyan then prayed and thanked him before the panel of judges, prosecutors, advisors or legal counsel until the visitors who came packed the courtroom.
"There is no preparation for anything, we just listen to what the judges' decision" said Sofyan Basir in the Corruption Court Building, Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
Meanwhile, shortly after the trial was closed, Sofyan appeared immediately approached and hugged his lawyer team. Sofyan did not fail to approach and hug his relatives or family who came to provide moral support to him.
The panel of judges decided that Sofyan was not involved in the alleged bribery case in connection with the project agreement for the construction of a Money Power Plant (PLTU).
The project in question is the construction of an Independent Power Producer of the Riau-1 Steam Mouth Power Plant (IPP PLTU MT) between PT Generating Java Bali Investment (PJBI) and Blackgold Natural Resources (BNR) Ltd. and China Huadian Engineering Company Limited (CHEC) Ltd.
The panel of judges also stated that Sofyan was not proven to have a role in assisting former Member of the House of Representatives (DPR) Eni Maulani Saragih in accepting bribes.
Earlier the KPK prosecutor charged that Sofyan Basir was aware of the alleged bribery of businessman Johannes Budisutrisno Kotjo to Eni.
Sofyan was previously charged by the prosecutor with a threat of a sentence of 5 years in prison and a fine of Rp. 200 million in the 3 months imprisonment.
The KPK prosecutor believes Sofyan was guilty of allegedly facilitating giving bribes from businessman Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo to former DPR member Eni Maulani Saragih and former Social Minister Idrus Marham.
